data.title: KBS WORLD TV
data.meta_description: KBS WORLD is a 24-hour family entertainment channel provided by KBS, the flagship public service broadcaster in Korea.
data.text:
00:00

Drama Series

Justice Ep.28

A lawyer who lost his family because of the corrupted power and dirty money makes a deal with an evil man with a desire to avenge of them.

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

00:35

Entertainment

The Seasons Ep.14

On a Friday night when a week starts and end, a talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

06:00

Drama Series

Beauty and Mr. Romantic Ep.38

“Beauty and Mr. Romantic” is a love story of an actress whose career has crashed overnight and an enthusiastic rookie producer who falls in love with her and tries to help her get her career back on track.

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

08:25

Drama Series

Three Bold Siblings Ep.49

A family drama about a firstborn daughter who had to be responsible for her family as the eldest, and a firstborn son who had to support his family as a top star. Together, they seek for their happiness.

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

09:40

Drama Series

Three Bold Siblings Ep.50

A family drama about a firstborn daughter who had to be responsible for her family as the eldest, and a firstborn son who had to support his family as a top star. Together, they seek for their happiness.

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

11:00

Entertainment

Two Days and One Night 4 Ep.236

Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

13:55

Entertainment

The Seasons W

On Saturday night, when the end of one week meets the start of another, this show will bring you music and stories that will soothe your worries and concerns.

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

14:10

Drama Series

Beauty and Mr. Romantic Ep.37

“Beauty and Mr. Romantic” is a love story of an actress whose career has crashed overnight and an enthusiastic rookie producer who falls in love with her and tries to help her get her career back on track.

Drama Series

Beauty and Mr. Romantic Ep.38

“Beauty and Mr. Romantic” is a love story of an actress whose career has crashed overnight and an enthusiastic rookie producer who falls in love with her and tries to help her get her career back on track.

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

17:00

Entertainment

My Neighbor, Charles Ep.447

Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

18:00

Entertainment

Music Bank Ep.1218

The best tunes in Korea! the most sensational music show on TV satisfies all your senses! Fantastic performances and Awe-inspiring harmony by the nation's top musicians! Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

19:25

Drama Series

Who Are You Ep.13

A 'top-it girl' from a prestigious high school in Gangnam has disappeared. This emotional and mysterious high school drama begins the story when she returns losing her memory. Hiding her real self, she struggles to survive as an it girl at the school and because of her, hidden secrets and desires start to come up to the surface. Then, their own league and regulations go awry in their exclusive world. Will she be able to break the old rules and make their friends change?

EN CN BM VI TH ID H

21:50

Drama Series

Soul Mechanic Ep.9

Wooju, a musical star who just has been selected for a lead role, isn't able to perform when she gets involved in a drunk driving accident. Then she meets Sijun, a psychiatrist who suggests drama therapy.

EN CN BM VI TH ID H
